1.Pros: McDonald's is a great place to work for those new to the job market (High School and College age workers). 1.Cons: There are no benefits offered, the pay is low, customers are frequently rude and management largely disregards employee complaints, your work experience depends heavily on your particular store's management (which is often unprofessional), and the stores I've worked at don't actually train new crew members before putting them to work.
